thread.title: 50,000-year-old Neanderthal teeth reveal what the real 'paleo diet' was actually like
thread.title_full: 50,000-year-old Neanderthal teeth reveal what the real 'paleo diet' was actually like

author: Rob Ludacer and Jessica Orwig
title: 50,000-year-old Neanderthal teeth reveal what the real 'paleo diet' was actually like
text:
embed 
In a recent paper published in Nature , researchers describe how Neanderthals in Europe ate â€” revealing what the original version of the "paleo diet" was actually like. Turns out, the paleo diet highly depended on where Neanderthals lives. Some ate mostly meat while others were vegetarian.
